title: Rule Tests for the Ruleset Checking Tool
description: Schema addition for ASHRAE 229 related to rule tests

name.description: Title of output report from Ruleset Checking Tool
name.notes: Nested like dicationary instead of as list. Existing example value shows- rule-21-10-a

section.notes: Capital data element name. Existing example value shows- 21

rule.notes: Capital data element name. Existing example value shows- 10

test.notes: Capital data element name. Existing example value shows- a

test_description.notes: Existing example value shows- Baseline RMR has HHW plant with the hot water pump that serves a total of 100,000 ft2 floor area. The pump's speed control value is correctly set to FIXED_SPEED

expected_rule_outcome.notes: May be an enumeration. Existing example value shows- pass

standard.description: List of rule that is being evalated

rule_id.description: The identification of the specific rule

rule_description.notes: Existing example value shows- When the baseline building uses boiler)s) or purchased hot water, the hot water pump shall be modeled as riding the pump curve if the hot water system serves less than 120,000 ft^2 otherwise it shall be modeled with a VFD.

applicable_rmr.notes: May be an enumeration. Existing example value shows- Baseline RMR

rule_assertion.notes: May be an enumeration. Existing example value shows- =

comparison_value.notes: May be an enumeration. Existing example value shows- Expected Value

primary_rule.notes: May be an enumeration. Existing example value shows- Yes

schema_version.notes: May be type of version. Existing example value shows- 0.0.23

name.notes: Nested like dicationary instead of as list. Existing example value shows- baseline

id.description: The identification of the specific set of transformations

ruleset_model_instances.notes: References the root element of the RMD specification
